services.title: API & Backend Integration

portfolio.title: Yas Home
portfolio.description: Built and maintained a production Flutter app with feature-first architecture for Yasâ€™Home, integrating a NestJS/PostgreSQL backend via Dio and using BLoC/Cubit for state management. Managed weekly Play Store/App Store releases with Shorebird hotfixes, pixel-perfect UI collaboration, and integration tests for stable updates.

portfolio.title: Izar
portfolio.description: Contributed to multiple Flutter projects in mono-repo setups (App, UI, Data/State) for Crafts and Code under international NDA including the Izar app, integrating GraphQL APIs and middleware-based ViewModels. Collaborated in daily Discord stand-ups, handled GitHub issues/PRs, and wrote Flutter tests to keep deployments stable. Store links and app details cannot be shared publicly as they are protected by the NDA.

portfolio.title: Livri
portfolio.description: Maintained and enhanced a full-stack B2B platform for a San Francisco-based startup with Berlin and Algeria ties, delivering features and fixes across Django/PostgreSQL backend, React Native app, and Next.js dashboard. Improved security and reliability with captchas, Cloudflare integration, and NGINX/Docker optimizations using GitHub Actions for automated deployments.

portfolio.title: Pharma Express
portfolio.description: Co-founded and led mobile development for Pharma Express, a platform where patients scan prescriptions in a Flutter app and nearby pharmacies receive them in an Electron/React desktop app. Built the Flutter app with MVVM, Provider/BLoC, localization, notifications, and medication alarms, and designed both mobile and desktop UIs in Figma. Integrated an Express.js backend and Mapbox/Google Maps to match patients with nearby pharmacies, track request status, and confirm pickup with clear prescription details and UX-optimized flows.
